title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 534 - Refunds And Credits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 534 - Refunds And Credits

State Regulations
§ 534.1 - General
§ 534.2 - Administrative procedures
§ 534.3 - Refunds and credits based on certain uses
§ 534.4 - Refunds and credits for omnibus carriers engaged in local transit service
§ 534.5 - Refund or credit based on the use of tangible personal property in certain services or based on a retail sale by a contractor
§ 534.6 - Refunds and credits by reason of cancelled sales and returned merchandise
§ 534.7 - Refunds and credits attributable to bad debts
§ 534.8 - Refunds or credits based on erroneous, illegal, or unconstitutional payment or collection of tax
§ 534.9 - Refund of sales or compensating use tax to consumers who have recovered the purchase price or a portion of such price from the manufacturer of a motor vehicle pursuant to section 198-a or 396-p(5) of the General Business Law
§ 534.10 - Refunds and credits for vessel operators engaged in local transit service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 534

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 475, 509[7], 697[a], 1096 [a], 1119, 1132[e], 1137-A, 1139, 1142, 1250, 1415[a]; L. 2004, ch. 60, part M
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
